bio:
Hi, I'm Sarah Jaye. I earned my Masters degree in Computer Science from University of California, Berkeley USA. 

I don’t belong to a very rich family. However, I was always taught to value honesty and hard work. Despite my struggles, I managed to complete my education throughout on scholarships with flying colors. Along with my technical qualification I also hold a diploma in proofreading and editing.

The reason I chose Computer Sciences was my inclination towards this field and I was always fascinated by the technical advancements of ever changing world. Throughout the course of my education I was involved in multiple projects involving technical development, website designing, programming, software development and etc. 

Over the last 10 years, I have developed a wide range of websites using 
HTML 5, CSS3, BOOTSTRAP,JAVASCRIPT,MYSQL,JQUERY, PHP, JSON,AJAX,CODEIGNITER and WORDPRESS, including sites for startup companies and small businesses.
 
My core competency lies in complete end to end management of a new website development projects, and I am seeking opportunities to build websites from the ground up for you or your business.

In addition, I have more than 5 years of working experience in Digital Marketing, SMM, SEM, SMO and SEO. I know that I would be an asset to your team and would very much appreciate the opportunity to discuss how my education, experience and creativity could contribute to your project.

Moreover, I also have experience in creative content writing specializing in website copywriting, technical writing, copy editing, Wikipedia page creation and editing and etc. Till date I have gathered more than 10 years of experience in these fields.

I always put client’s confidentiality, prompt turnaround time and satisfaction among my top most priorities. Contact me now, let's discuss how to achieve your goals.

I do not communicate outside of Guru before getting hired as it is against Guru's policy.
Sometimes, I do not work on Saturdays and Sundays to recharge my battery:).

abstrac: The videos and illustrations I create make sure your target customer see's you as their solution.
bio:
Do you need visuals that are unique? Do you want your projects to stand out? Do you need your project to be completely quickly and on time? 

I am a multi-skilled creative with strengths in 2D animation, illustration and motion graphics with a passion for great story telling. I am an established, skilled, reliable freelancer. 

I currently offer:

    Moho Pro 12.5
    Adobe After Effects
    Explainer video creation
    Logo animation
    2D character design
    2D Character animation
    Background music

I have created artwork for Film, TV, music videos, and several award winning published books ranging from childrens books to comics. Then I was introduced to animation and started working under contract for Tivoli Films / Hallman Animation where I get to combine all the things I love as an animator, concept and storyboard artist rigger and illustrator. I have created animations for use in commercial, corporate and music promotion projects

 I work with PC platform Photoshop, Moho Pro 12, Affinity Design, and Adobe Illustrator. WACOM Cintiq.
Preferred pricing is flat rate. All rights to the finished art becomes the property of the client once payment has been received.

abstrac: Quantity or Quality? the choice is yours!
bio:
Our transparent solution allows our clients to know what's going on. Most folks
outsourcing HAVE to worry about potentially getting burned or throwing away
money, not really getting a firm grasp of what is going on a couple of thousand
miles away.

With our transparent solution you will have daily access to agents
transactions, or computer screens while they work your shift, project via agile SCRUM boards or tech.

This allows you to make on the spot adjustments, tune the project according to your needs, increase efficiency and once again the overall peace of mind of knowing that your money is being worked for and earned.

Our motto is show and prove. Give us a one to two-week trial and we will make your believers. We ask for a fair amount of time for you to truly analyze our work and from there see if we merit a longer contract or not. 

Look forward to hearing from you!
